Best FPS ever. Worst anti cheat ever. But we play anyway.
低分段很多炸鱼的，有考虑低分段玩家的游戏体验吗，他们破坏游戏平衡，从某种意义上来说跟挂又有什么区别，没意思好不容易打上的分遇到几把炸鱼的又回到解放前，退游了祝每位代练的父母身体健康！

СДЕЛАЙТЕ ПОЖАЛУЙСТА IQ ТЕСТ!!!!!!!! ТИММЕЙТЫ ОБДРИСТАННЫЕ РАКИ СТОЯТ АФК НА ПОСЛЕДНИХ И ПЕРВЫХ РАУНДАХ , ИГРАЮТ КАК НОВОРОЖДЕННЫЕ ДЕТЕНЫШИ И ПОСТОЯННО УМИРАЮТ ПРОСТО ТАК!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! А ПОСЛЕ IQ ТЕСТА УЖЕ 50% ЭТИХ ДАУНОВ НЕ БУДУТ ИГРАТЬ И МЕШАТЬ СЛИВАТЬ МНЕ И ВСЕМ ЗВАНИЯ В ММ

Sa va iau jocul in pula, ca nu sunteti in stare sa faceti un anti-cheat. Numa codati, nu il recomand!
Игра на самом деле хорошая, если купить прайм статус.

This is a really good game, I only play deathmatch so I'm not too familiar with the 5v5 game modes but from what I've played its very fun and rewards skill in ways most games don't. I quite enjoy running around with dual berettas and getting killed at every turn but sometimes I defeat a guy and it's awesome.

Don't recommend however if you are susceptible to gambling, I almost got into it and lost $3 because I was curious what I would get if I opened a crate, if you want skins sell steam cards or sell whatever crates you have. Do not put real money into this, it's not worth it.
Better than Valorant but still mid

Jogo CS desde meados de 2000 e lá vai pedrada. Eram outros tempos, outro game, mas o CS GO Evoluiu o game pra algo muito bacana! Questão de parte da comunidade ser bem tiltada e tóxica é um mal de jogos online, não tem muito o que fazer.

You shoot people in the head or get headshotted yourself. a very simple game and you might want to throw grenades just to look cool.
I recommend watching pro and bet your money but it'll 90 % ruin your wallet like everyone else. and if you are lucky you get a case while playing but sell it don't open it scam! you'll never drop a knife anyway.
